actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The griffon makes one Beak attack and one Claws attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Sight
special_abilities.desc: The griffon's Perception is 18 when perceiving by sight.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The griffon is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The griffon has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the griffon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the griffon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the griffon can make one Beak attack against it as a bonus action.
